__e: Yes, I know, but there will be no problem when big Jer and I here go on a hunting expedition.
Remember that expedition you were on when you wrote me with, um, gosh, what was his name?
You don't want me going on this research trip because you're afraid to be alone.
a grand expedition... to do just that.
Yeah, I checked the tracking number. That's why I'm calling you right now.
Ma'am, look, this isn't some kind of fact-finding expedition.
And the next delivery is in three days.
This is no longer his command, is that clear?
I'm going on a new expedition and you'll have what I promised.
